Menu.processes.AsidReplacementWizard.des: This wizard allows to execute aSiD replacement or swap for cases where aSiD found damage and needs replacement
Menu.processes.ColorChangeWizard.descrip: On-Press Fase Ink Replacement (OFIR) is a cleaning process designed to help users efficiently clean and maintain the components of the digital press while also facilitating ink station color changes.{br} The process involves using a special service cart to ensure that all parts of the press are thoroughly cleaned and ready for a new ink color.{br} {br}The OFIR process offers several benefits, including:{br}  1. Streamlined maintenance: By providing a systematic cleaning process, OFIR allows operators and customer engineers to easily maintain their press components, ensuring optimal performance and print quality.{br} 2. Simplified color changes: The OFIR process enables users to change ink station colors seamlessly by thoroughly cleaning the necessary components, reducing the risk of color contamination and ensuring accurate color reproduction in subsequent print runs.{br} {br} The On-Press Fast Ink Replacement (OFIR) feature is a valuable tool that simplifies press color changes and maintenance, ultimately contributing to color stations management on press.
Menu.processes.DryBid.description: This wizard allows to execute Dry BID process for cases when press was shutdown unexpectedly or when Dry BID was not performed as part of the post-print.{br}Usually Dry BID process if fully automatically and not required additional execution unless dedicated icon of Dry BID required is shown on main monitor.
Menu.processes.InkPreperation.descriptio: This wizards allows to prepare the ink solution while press state at standby in order to reduce Get Ready time or validate ink station functionality prior changing the Press state to Ready.
Menu.processes.StickyRoller: Blanket Cleaning Roller (BCR) Engage Force Calibration
Menu.processes.WHSRelativeSpeedCalibrati: Web Handling System (WHS) Relative Speed Calibration
Menu.processes.TensionerMechanicalCalibr: This procedure is aimed to allow Parallelism calibration of the Tensioner roller  to ITM roller
Menu.processes.LphReplacement.descriptio: This wizard is aimed to allow replaceing LPH and reseting LPH parameters as part of troubleshooting
Menu.processes.InkSasPressureSensorCalib: Ink SAS - RDU Pressure sensor calibration
Menu.processes.ImoPressurSensorCalibrati: This Wizard is aimed to allow pressure / level sensor calibration according to user selection
